DOC.HEADLINE: New Orleans evacuating residents amid Rita threat: mayor

TEXT.S: New Orleans evacuating residents amid Rita threat: mayor
Emergency services began evacuating residents of hurricane-ravaged New Orleans once again Tuesday due to the threat posed by Hurricane Rita, Mayor Ray Nagin said.
"We have had an influx of evacuees that have made their way to the convention center.
We've already evacuated two busloads of individuals," Nagin said as Rita barreled near southernmost Florida, heading west on a track that could take it close to the devastated Louisiana city.
